name: Basic Tower Defence
description:
This is TD is as basic as they come, 3 turret types, 3 enemy type less than 10 waves. It was made as project to learn superpowers better by an amateur game developer (me) in approximatively 1 days worth of work spread throughout a week. Feedback is welcome as I don't intend to completely leave this project behind.

Play in Full screen mode to avoid issues

credits for the music :
